other_tests.changes_over_time: Improved to 55% by TTE 2 weeks after discharge

other_tests.findings: T-wave inversion (TWI) in anterior leads, new compared to prior
Area of hypokinesis consistent with ischemia in the distribution of mid-distal LAD
No filling defect to indicate a pulmonary embolus; normal thoracic aorta; no pericardial effusion; lungs clear without masses
Low suspicion for acute coronary syndrome
